issue.title: [Python] Cannot install via pip M1 Mac on Python 3.7
issue.body:

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15384?focusedCommentId=17479055) by Rohit Pathak (rohitppathak):*
Looking at [this ticket](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12122) and [this PR](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10812), can we add a wheel for python 3.7 for M1 compatibility? Something [like this](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12195)?
